name: Magus Knight
description:
Its 1942, All hope is Lost Hitler and his forces are unstoppable. However out of nowhere, a heroic knight imbued with mystical powers and flight has taken to the skies to destroy Hitler's aerial forces. He is the last hope!

Cool stuff

- 2 Melee Weapons to BRUTALISE your enemies with

- 3 Spells to DESTROY your foes with

- Customisable loadout 

- Intense aerial combat!

- Explosive visuals

- Wipe out enemies in quick succession to increase your combo!

- Try to outlast Hitler's forces! and get the highest score possible.

Instructions 

Arrow Keys

Up to Accelerate 

Left/Right to Turn/Rotate

X to Use Spell

C to Attack




Team members:
